name: RE:Pear
description:
An attempt at a JRPG in GB Studio before abandoning ship and switching to Godot. Made for Global Game Jam 2020.

Credits:

  • AniMerrill (Ethan Merrill) - programming
  • uncool-and-uncouth (Taylor W.) - art, maps
  • vince94 (Vince S.) - music, intro graphics
  • Jonathan Wideman - Programming
  • Caleb Carroll- initial map design, story
